channel.title: Posts on My Hugo Blog Test

item.title: My First Test Post
item.description:
Welcome to my test blog! This post demonstrates Org-mode features with LaTeX math using \( \) for inline and \[ \] for display.

  • Link: Example Site
  • Image: Sample Image

Inline math example: The famous equation is \( E = mc^2 \), where \( m \) is mass and \( c \) is the speed of light.

Display math examples:

The Gaussian integral: \[ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} \, dx = \sqrt{\pi} \]

A quadratic equation solution: \[ x = \frac{ -b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac} }{2a} \]
